item.title: How Social Security has gotten worse under Trump
item.description: Customer service deteriorated by key measures as the agency enacted sweeping cuts in Trump’s second term, internal data and interviews show.

item.title: As rumors swirl after political killings, this GOP lawmaker draws a line

item.title: Why Trump’s EEOC wants to talk to White men about discrimination
item.description: Armed with a quorum and GOP majority, Chair Andrea Lucas is pressing new priorities — such as dismantling DEI — that criticis say have turned the agen...

item.title: Trump says U.S. destroyed loading dock in Venezuela
item.description: Trump would not say whether the military or the CIA conducted the strike in Venezuela amid escalating U.S. pressure on Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: Netanyahu, Trump project unity as Middle East tensions rise
item.description: Netanyahu has hailed Trump as the “greatest friend Israel has ever had in the White House.” Now the two must navigate rifts over Middle East strategy.
